name: Chasing Tales: Rallying Cry
description: "This next one is called 'We're Comrades, Not Friends, Don't Talk to Me After This Is Over,' and it goes a little something like this..."
requirement: Gain 30 boons while wielding a warhorn in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Gained 30 boons while wielding a warhorn in Thunderhead Peaks.
